name: react4xp-buildconstants
description: React4xp helper: creates a JSON file with shared constants that define and setup a React4xp project.

scripts.test:mocha: NODE_PATH=. npx mocha --require @babel/register --require @babel/polyfill --require test/test_helper.js "test/**/*@(spec.js)" && mkdir test/output/cli; bin/cli.js test/output/cli && node_modules/path-exists-cli/cli.js test/output/cli/react4xp_constants.json && node_modules/path-exists-cli/cli.js test/output/cli/build/resources/main/lib/enonic/react4xp/react4xp_constants.json

author: Espen Norderud
